messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine an art office with 21 artists. Amy is working with Bob, Cal, Dan, Eva, Fay, and Gus. Ian is working with Joe, Kim, Leo, Max, Ned, and Ola. Sue is working with Tom, Zac, Kai, Liv, Pam, and Gia. Fay is working with Gus, Bob, Cal, Dan, and Eva. Cal is working with Dan, Eva, Gus, and Bob. Kim is working with Dan, Leo, Max, Ned, and Ola. Ned is working with Ola, Joe, Leo, and Max. Pam is working with Gia, Tom, Zac, Kai, and Liv. Eva is working with Gus, Bob and Zac. Leo is working with Max, Ola, and Joe. Max is connected to Ola and Joe. Liv is working with Gia, Tom, Zac, and Kai. Gus is working with Bob, and Dan. Ola is working with Joe. Gia is working Tom, Zac, and Kai. Bob is working with Dan. Joe is working with Kai. Kai is working with Tom. Tom is working with Zac. What is the shortest path from Eva to Dan? Please list the names in order, separated by commas.

The first line contains an integer T, the number of test cases.
The first line of each test case contains an integer N, the number of artists.
The second line contains N space-separated strings, the names of the artists.
The third line contains an integer M, the number of artists that Eva is connected to.
The fourth line contains M space-separated strings, the names of the artists that Eva is connected to.
The fifth line contains an integer Q, the number of artists that Dan is connected to.
The sixth line contains Q space-separated strings, the names of the artists that Dan is connected to.
The seventh line contains an integer P, the number of artists that Dan is connected to.
The eighth line contains P space-separated strings, the names of the artists that Dan is connected to.
The ninth line contains an integer R, the number of artists that Dan is connected to.
The tenth line contains R space-separated strings, the names of the artists that Dan is connected to.

For each to Dan in a single line.
The names of the artists should be printed in the order given in the input
